#summary How to get JGF.

= Downloading JGF =

Currently JGF is in a very early stage of development.

It can only be downloaded as source from:

[http://code.google.com/p/jgf/source/checkout http://code.google.com/p/jgf/source/checkout]

= Dependencies =

In order to use JGF, you will need to add libraries or a project dependencie to [http://www.jmonkeyengine.com JMonkeyEngine] (the underlying game engine). 

All other dependencies are included.
